useCase.name: Developing CMS Strategy
useCase.description: Creating a comprehensive strategy for implementing a Content Management System (CMS)

successEndConditions.condition: CMS strategy documentation provided and CMS setup completed

failureEndConditions.condition: Failure to provide CMS strategy documentation or complete CMS setup

mainSequence.step: Provide feedback data from usability testing
Recommend CMS features based on analysis
Evaluate technical feasibility of recommended features
Adjust recommendations based on technical input
Provide CMS strategy documentation to Employee
Initiate CMS implementation based on strategy
Notify Employee of CMS setup completion
